welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Wickham, a charming town in the heart of the United Kingdom known for its picturesque landscapes and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport handles mainly international and long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Northolt Airport caters to high-end private jets and their passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or payment.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the oldest terminals at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly Oneworld airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly SkyTeam and non-aligned airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The main terminal at Heathrow Airport, serving mostly British Airways and Iberia flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available for 45 minutes, after which a fee is charged.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
